name: A.S. Designs & Services
description:
AS Designs & Services LLC is a Hawaii Web Design and Marketing Agency that helps businesses succeed on the web through a combination of technology, creativity, and innovation. Our web services cover every aspect of building and operating an effective online presence - from professional web development and design, results-oriented online advertising solutions, to powerful web hosting and eCommerce applications.
Over the years we've earned our customer's loyalty by ensuring that our clients not only get on the web, but thrive on the web. We have been offering web services to small businesses in Hawaii and the mainland since 2001. We back our products with friendly customer service and our mission is to help our clients leverage the power of the Internet to grow their businesses. Complete turn-key website design, service and support.  No matter where you are in the world we can register, design, host and market your new busienss website. We also offer ongoing webmaster and marketing services so you can rest assured your site is up to date for your current business needs.
READ MORE...
